name: Bomb Mob
description:
Try and explode your friends in this Bomberman inspired game that introduces classes to the core mechanic.
At the moment you can choose between the four main classes:
Ninja: Sprint and blind enemies with a powerful smoke-bomb.
Pirate: Shoot your enemies for a  stun or shoot the bombs to explode them instantly.
Witch: Cast your ice spell for a long freeze. You can freeze bombs too!
Viking: Punch your enemies to stun them or some bombs to throw them some tiles away. Can be charged.
